alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Berkshire County through 630 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Windsor, or 11 miles east of Pittsfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads. Locations impacted include... Florida, Savoy, Dalton, Hinsdale, Windsor, Peru, Savoy Center, Little Egypt, Brier, Whitcomb Summit, Eastern Summit and Drury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
